value.name: Wallace, William "Billy" Franklin Jr. (Dunlap)
value.description: William "Billy" Franklin Wallace Jr, 81, of Dunlap, Tennessee, passed away Thursday, May 21, 2015 at his home. He was a member of the Church of Christ. Mr. Wallace was preceded in death by his ...

value.name: Football Coaches Poll
value.description: Bobby Wallace, Temple; Charlie Weis, Notre Dame; Tyrone Willingham, Washington 'More than a son to me': The loss of his father led NC State's Jordan Poole to a family he never expected

value.name: North Alabama gets past tough Shepherd defense in D-II semis
value.description: "Very proud to have this opportunity to come here and play a great football game," said North Alabama head coach Bobby Wallace. "I give Shepherd a lot of credit for making it very tough on us."
